instances.cloud_init_yaml:
#cloud-config packages: - nginx - oci-utils - python36 - python-oci-cli write_files: # Add aliases to bash (Note: At time of writing the append flag does not appear to be working) - path: /etc/.bashrc append: true content: | alias lh='ls -lash' alias lt='ls -last' alias env='/usr/bin/env | sort' alias whatsmyip='curl -X GET https://www.whatismyip.net | grep ipaddress' # Create nginx index.html - path: /usr/share/nginx/html/index1.html permissions: '0644' content: | OCI Loadbalancer backend {hostname}

OCI Regional Subnet Loadbalancer Backend {hostname}

runcmd: # Enable nginx - sudo systemctl enable nginx.service - sudo cp -v /usr/share/nginx/html/index1.html /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html - sudo sed -i "s/{hostname}/$(hostname)/g" /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html - sudo systemctl start nginx.service # Set Firewall Rules - sudo firewall-offline-cmd --add-port=80/tcp - sudo systemctl restart firewalld # Add additional environment information because append does not appear to work in write_file - sudo bash -c "echo 'source /etc/.bashrc' >> /etc/bashrc" final_message: "**** The system is finally up, after $UPTIME seconds ****"
